list.name: Collector Status Change Annotations
list.rawQuery:
select ss.host||':'||ss.port||'/'||ss.database_name ||' - '||scs.collector_name as text ,
scs.status||' '||scs.message  as tags,
scs.start_time as time
from 
spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats scs
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ss on scs.source_id =ss.source_id
where
$__timeFilter(start_time)
--and scs.status in ($col_status)
and scs.collector_name in ($colnamef)
and ss.database_name in ($dbnamef)
and ss.host in ($hostf)
order by scs.start_time

panels.description: Status gets only updated if at least one collector is active for database/system

targets.rawSql:
select 
sum(case when ses.status_db ='DOWN' then 1 else 0 end) as status_db_down, 
sum(case when ses.status_db ='UP' then 1 else 0 END) as status_db_up
from spg_mon.spgdb_environment_stats ses 
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ssdb on ses.source_db_id = ssdb.source_id 
where end_time>'9999-12-12'
and $__timeFilter(last_stats_time);

panels.title: Status Databases Monitored

panels.description: Status gets only updated if at least one collector is active for database/system

targets.rawSql:
select 
$__timeGroupAlias(current_timestamp,$__interval),
--sum(case when ses.status_db ='DOWN' then 1 else 0 end) as status_db_down
host||':'||port||'/'||database_name as metric,
count(*) as value
from spg_mon.spgdb_environment_stats ses 
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ssdb on ses.source_db_id = ssdb.source_id 
where end_time>'9999-12-12'
and $__timeFilter(last_stats_time)
and ses.status_db ='DOWN'
group by 1,2;

panels.title: Databases Down

panels.description: Status gets only updated if at least one collector is active for database/system

targets.rawSql:
select ssdb.host ,ssdb.port ,ssdb.database_name,
case when ses.status_db ='DOWN' then -1 when ses.status_db ='UP' then 1 else NULL END as status_db,
case when ses.status_server ='DOWN' then -1 when ses.status_server='UP' then 1 else NULL END as status_server,
ses.last_stats_time as last_status_update
from spg_mon.spgdb_environment_stats ses 
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ssdb on ses.source_db_id = ssdb.source_id 
where end_time>'9999-12-12'
and (ses.status_db in ($server_db_status) or ses.status_server in ($server_db_status))
and $__timeFilter(last_stats_time)
and ssdb.database_name in ($dbnamef)
and ssdb.host in ($hostf);

panels.title: Systems Monitored in Status $server_db_status | Databases $dbnamef | Hosts $hostf

panels.description: Status gets only updated if at least one collector is active for database/system

targets.rawSql:
select 
sum(case when ses.status_server ='DOWN' then 1 else 0 end) as status_server_down, 
sum(case when ses.status_server ='UP' then 1 else 0 END) as status_server_up
from spg_mon.spgdb_environment_stats ses 
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ssdb on ses.source_db_id = ssdb.source_id 
where end_time>'9999-12-12'
and $__timeFilter(last_stats_time);

panels.title: Status Servers Monitored

panels.description: Status gets only updated if at least one collector is active for database/system

targets.rawSql:
select 
$__timeGroupAlias(current_timestamp,$__interval),
host||':'||port as metric,
count(*) as value
from spg_mon.spgdb_environment_stats ses 
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ssdb on ses.source_db_id = ssdb.source_id 
where end_time>'9999-12-12'
and ses.status_server ='DOWN' 
and $__timeFilter(last_stats_time)
group by 1,2;

panels.title: Servers Down

targets.rawSql:
select 
sum(case when scs.status ='DISABLED' then 1 else 0 end) as DISABLED,
sum(case when scs.status ='ENABLED' then 1 else 0 end) as ENABLED,
sum(case when scs.status ='RUNNING' then 1 else 0 end) as RUNNING,
sum(case when scs.status ='WARNING' then 1 else 0 end) as WARNING,
sum(case when scs.status ='ERROR' then 1 else 0 end) as ERROR,
sum(case when scs.status ='STOPPED' then 1 else 0 end) as STOPPED
from 
spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats scs
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ss on scs.source_id =ss.source_id
where --scs.end_time >'9999-12-12' and 
scs.start_time=(select max(start_time) from spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats i where i.source_id=scs.source_id and i.collector_name=scs.collector_name)
and $__timeFilter(last_stats_time);

panels.description: Only those that got an update withing last week will be shown

targets.rawSql:
select 
$__timeGroupAlias(current_timestamp,$__interval),
ss.host||':'||ss.port||'/'||ss.database_name||' ('||scs.collector_name||')' as metric,
1 as value
from 
spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats scs
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ss on scs.source_id =ss.source_id
where --scs.end_time >'9999-12-12' 
--and 
scs.status='STOPPED' and
scs.start_time=(select max(start_time) from spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats i where i.source_id=scs.source_id and i.collector_name=scs.collector_name)
--and last_stats_time > current_timestamp - interval '1 week'
and $__timeFilter(last_stats_time)
group by 1,2

panels.title: Collector in Status Stopped

targets.rawSql:
select ss.host,ss.port,ss.database_name,scs.collector_name ,
case  scs.status 
  when 'DISABLED' then 0
  when 'ENABLED' then 1
  when 'RUNNING' then 2
  when 'WARNING' then 3
  when 'ERROR' then 4
  when 'STOPPED' then 5
  else null end as status,
scs.last_stats_time as last_status_update,scs.message from 
spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats scs
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ss on scs.source_id =ss.source_id
where --scs.end_time >'9999-12-12' 
--and 
scs.start_time=(select max(start_time) from spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats i where i.source_id=scs.source_id and i.collector_name=scs.collector_name)
and scs.status in ($col_status)
and $__timeFilter(last_stats_time)
and scs.collector_name in ($colnamef)
and ss.database_name in ($dbnamef)
and ss.host in ($hostf);

panels.title: Collector in Status $col_status | Collector $colnamef | Databases $dbnamef | Hosts $hostf

panels.description: Only those that got an update withing last week will be shown

targets.rawSql:
select 
$__timeGroupAlias(current_timestamp,$__interval),
ss.host||':'||ss.port||'/'||ss.database_name||' ('||scs.collector_name||')' as metric,
1 as value
from 
spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats scs
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ss on scs.source_id =ss.source_id
where --scs.end_time >'9999-12-12' 
--and 
scs.status='ERROR' and
scs.start_time=(select max(start_time) from spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats i where i.source_id=scs.source_id and i.collector_name=scs.collector_name)
--and last_stats_time > current_timestamp - interval '1 week'
and $__timeFilter(last_stats_time)
group by 1,2

panels.title: Collector in Status ERROR

panels.description: Filter with field at the top

targets.rawSql:
select ss.host,ss.port,ss.database_name,scs.collector_name ,
case  scs.status 
  when 'DISABLED' then 0
  when 'ENABLED' then 1
  when 'RUNNING' then 2
  when 'WARNING' then 3
  when 'ERROR' then 4
  when 'STOPPED' then 5
  else null end as status,
scs.start_time,
scs.end_time,
scs.last_stats_time as last_status_update,
scs.message 
from 
spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats scs
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ss on scs.source_id =ss.source_id
where
($__timeFilter(start_time) or $__timeFilter(last_stats_time) or $__timeFilter(end_time) )
--and scs.status in ($col_status)
and scs.collector_name in ($colnamef)
and ss.database_name in ($dbnamef)
and ss.host in ($hostf)
order by last_stats_time desc
fetch first 10000 row only
/*scs.end_time >'9999-12-12' 
and scs.start_time=(select max(start_time) from spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats i where i.source_id=scs.source_id and i.collector_name=scs.collector_name)
and scs.status in ($col_status)*/;

panels.title: Collector Stats History - Collector $colnamef | Databases $dbnamef | Hosts $hostf (fetch first 10k rows order by last_status_update)

panels.description: Status gets only updated if at least one collector is active for database/system

targets.rawSql:
select ssdb.host ,ssdb.port ,ssdb.database_name,
case when ses.status_db ='DOWN' then -1 when ses.status_db ='UP' then 1 else NULL END as status_db,
case when ses.status_server ='DOWN' then -1 when ses.status_server='UP' then 1 else NULL END as status_server,
ses.start_time,
ses.end_time,
ses.last_stats_time as last_status_update,
ses.message 
from spg_mon.spgdb_environment_stats ses 
join spg_mon.spgdb_source ssdb on ses.source_db_id = ssdb.source_id 
where
($__timeFilter(start_time) or $__timeFilter(last_stats_time) or $__timeFilter(end_time) )
--and scs.status in ($col_status)
and ssdb.database_name in ($dbnamef)
and ssdb.host in ($hostf)
order by last_stats_time desc
fetch first 10000 row only

panels.title: Systems Stats History - Databases $dbnamef | Hosts $hostf (fetch first 10k rows order by last_status_update)

list.definition: select distinct collector_name from spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats scs
list.label: Collector Filter
list.name: colnamef
list.query: select distinct collector_name from spg_mon.spgdb_collector_stats scs
